name: @flowr/petal-utils
description: Package that contains shared utils within Petal projects

scripts.bootstrap: pnpm run clean && tsc --allowJs --outDir cjs --noEmit false --module CommonJS && tsc --declaration --isolatedModules false --outDir types --emitDeclarationOnly --noEmit false
